name: Brick Classic - Block Puzzle
description:
Seems like it's quite easy to play Brick Legend Block Puzzle classic game, but as levels progress, you feel that playing Brick Legend Block Puzzle may be a real challenge.
One turns them or moves left and right when falling block, trying to arrange the shapes in a line. When a line of squares makes a line from edge to edge, it disappears and all the pieces move down by a square.When the well is filled up, the player loses.
Brick Legend Block Puzzle 2017 game is a in most brick games with the shapes each consisting of several squares, that are falling down the well.
Brick Legend Block Puzzle is greatest and smoothest block puzzle game and It is classical game and very interesting with very nice graphics design. It’ll take you back to the childhood

FEATURED :
- Great graphics and music
- Classic, challenge and adventure mode.
- Good relax your brain
- Swipe to screen to move block
- Challenge with LeaderBoards.



Game interface is very friendly and simple to use for all users of all ages.
Enjoy with Brick Legend Block Puzzle now
